tool_description: This API gets the top news from the most important sports websites
name: Top Sports News
title: Top Sports News

api_list.name: Espn
api_list.description: Get the top news from ESPN website.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://top-sports-news.p.rapidapi.com/espn"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-sports-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

api_list.name: Espn by category
api_list.description:
Get top ESPN news by category

The path only allows one value

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description:
- nba
- mlb
- nfl
- soccer
- ncaff
- mma
- wnba
- olympics
- ncaam
- golf
- nascar
- racing
- rugby
- ncaaw
- tennis
- little-league-world-series
- boxing
- chalk
- f1
- nba-g-league
- wwe

api_list.name: 90min leagues
api_list.description: Gets the league news from 90min website
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://top-sports-news.p.rapidapi.com/90min/leagues/premier-league"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-sports-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://top-sports-news.p.rapidapi.com/90min/leagues/{league}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-sports-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
